title: (WA) Super Luxury House For Sale - Fully furnished
location: SAMA MAWATHA OFF D P WIJESINGHE MAWATHA, Pelawatte
details:
We have a super luxury house for sale - FULLY FURNISHED - custom made

65 perches land with new house and beautifully laid out garden with many fruit trees
4 bedrooms with AC and attached bathrooms and shower cubicles
servants quarters
3 floors with facility to build more rooms on top
fully fitted pantry and wet kitchen
garage for 2 vehicles / remote gate
fully tilled and seeing is believing

Rs 155 million - negotiable (PRICE VALID TILL 31MAR2018 ONLY)
all deeds and other municipal docs updated and in hand.

viewing by appointment/ appointments available this weekend
genuine buyers only no time wasters
pictures could be sent on request only
